subclusters.subcluster_name: Reproductive Effort and Oxidative Stress Tradeoff Theory
Protein Stability and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
Homeostatic Oxidative Damage Model of Aging

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS production, mitochondrial DNA damage, and antioxidant enzyme insufficiency driving aging.
Emphasizes mitochondria as main ROS source and target, with oxidative damage causing physiological decline.
Describes mitochondrial vicious cycle of ROS damaging mtDNA, leading to mutations and aging.
Highlights mitochondrial ROS production, oxidative damage to mitochondrial components, and lifespan correlation.
Links longevity to mitochondrial stress resistance, ROS detoxification, and antioxidant defenses.
Focuses on mitochondrial dysfunction, mtROS accumulation, and oxidative stress roles in aging and cancer.
Describes lower ROS production and oxidative stress-induced inflammation in long-lived species.
Pollutant-induced mitochondrial dysfunction increases ROS, causing oxidative damage and accelerating aging.
General oxidative stress theory emphasizing ROS accumulation, antioxidant imbalance, and oxidative damage biomarkers.
Links metabolic rate, free radical production, and lifespan differences across species.
Focuses on age-dependent changes in antioxidant enzymes and compensatory responses to ROS.
Examines antioxidant defense systems and oxidative damage accumulation affecting lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Effort and Oxidative Stress Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative damage as a cost of reproduction affecting lifespan and resource allocation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Effort and Oxidative Stress Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress mediating life-history tradeoffs between reproduction and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Effort and Oxidative Stress Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links reproductive effort to increased oxidative stress and accelerated aging as a physiological cost.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nrf2-Regulated Antioxidant Defense and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights Nrf2 as master regulator of antioxidant defenses influencing oxidative stress and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Protein Stability and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on protein structural stability, resistance to oxidation, and proteostasis in longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Protein Stability and Oxidative Stress Resistance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes accumulation of oxidized proteins and their impact on protein function and aging.
Describes oxidative DNA damage triggering cellular senescence and SASP-driven inflammation accelerating aging.
Links oxidative/nitrosative stress to molecular damage and cellular senescence contributing to aging.
Connects mitochondrial ROS, immune activation, inflamm-aging, and senescence in aging process.
Focuses on chronic oxidative and inflammatory stress, immune dysregulation, and inflamm-aging.
Describes chronic oxidative-inflammatory stress, glutathione cycle dysregulation, and immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Homeostatic Oxidative Damage Model of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Presents a homeostatic model linking oxidative damage accumulation to decline in physiological homeostasis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Homeostatic Oxidative Damage Model of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes ROS level fluctuation control and homeostasis as key determinants of aging and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Homeostatic Oxidative Damage Model of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Unifies oxidative stress with genetic programming and metabolic potential influencing aging rate.
Focuses on melatonin as endogenous antioxidant reducing oxidative/nitrosative stress and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitohormesis and Adaptive Stress Response Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mild mitochondrial stress inducing adaptive antioxidant responses and longevity via mitokines.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lipid Peroxidation and Antioxidant Defense in Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes age-related lipid peroxidation, antioxidant enzyme activity changes, and mortality in aging.
